channel.title: Making NPC's walk
channel.description:
Alright i understand how to do it with all the X and Y coordinates and +1 -1 things and walktype blah blah. However, most tutorials say that press enter before "[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]" but i don't have this. Also I am a mac user so that could be a problem number one but when i go to open autospawn, i have to choose app to textedit which looks to work since i can change owner, mod and admin.
Is there something I am doing wrong. Basically i just do this.
Guard spawn = 9 2967 3396 0 2968 3398 2963 3391 1 Falador North
I added this down the bottom. Help would be much appreciated. ;)

item.title: Making NPC's walk
item.dc:creator: @gilbo184 gilbo184
item.description:
@gilbo184 wrote:

spawn = 9 3233 3245 0 3234 3246 3232 3244 1 guard look i will try to make a vid for you to see.

Also this code is not a real one just one to show if i am doing it right.

I use textedit and then scroll all the way to the bottom and put the code above in. I will show what i mean by no [ENDOFSPAWNLIST]:

edit: How do i make more then one code?

After all of this i go to file/save and it saves the autospawn. Do i then log out and log in and the npc will be there moving or just still? Also do i log out and then code or doesn’t really matter?

Read full topic

item.title: Making NPC's walk
item.dc:creator: @gilbo184 gilbo184
item.description:
@gilbo184 wrote:

Alright i understand how to do it with all the X and Y coordinates and +1 -1 things and walktype blah blah. However, most tutorials say that press enter before “[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]” but i don’t have this. Also I am a mac user so that could be a problem number one but when i go to open autospawn, i have to choose app to textedit which looks to work since i can change owner, mod and admin.

Is there something I am doing wrong. Basically i just do this.

Guard
spawn = 9 2967 3396 0 2968 3398 2963 3391 1 Falador North

I added this down the bottom. Help would be much appreciated.
